scripts.supabase:types: npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id ${SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID:-mjhqeagxibsklugikyma} > src/lib/server/types/supabase.ts
scripts.supabase:types:local: npx supabase gen types typescript --local > src/lib/server/types/supabase.ts
scripts.db:schema: echo 'Please execute database_schema.sql in Supabase Dashboard > SQL Editor'
scripts.db:reset: echo 'Use Supabase Dashboard > Database > Reset to reset database'
scripts.db:migrate: echo 'Use Supabase Dashboard > SQL Editor to execute migration scripts'
